Key Match Events: Chancel Mbemba scored in the 27th minute
Yoane Wissa scored in the 65th minute
Arthur Masuaku scored in the 82nd minute
Mohamed Bayo scored a penalty in the 21st minute
Post-Match Reflections: The Democratic Republic of Congo came from a goal behind to beat Guinea 3-1 in their Africa Cup of Nations quarter-final
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Alassane Ouattara Olympic Stadium in Abidjan, Ivory Coast
Others: The match was refereed by Mustapha Ghorbal
